$WmMPID_フローラ,ch05_41_Flora_F_Normal,Face|We're twins, so we should see each
other as equals! So, how about it?
Will you watch my back out there? $k$p$WmMPID_フェリシア,ch05_15_Felicia_F_Normal,Face|Of course I will! So long as you look
out for me off the battlefield, I will
protect you while we're on it!$k$p$Sbs1000|
